title: Leblanc is a joke
body: Its been long enough.  LB is absolute crap.  The rework did not work...just remove her from the game and refund me for all the skins i bought for her.

replies.body: Am I the only person who reads this as "I got owned by leblanc. Please delete her"

Seems like OP is complaining about her being too weak tbh, which considering she was handled by the same bloke who gutted Akali while saying with a straight face it wasn't a nerf, would be understandable.

> [{quoted}](name=Limmie,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=veld2AAP,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-05-25T15:45:44.231+0000)
>
> Seems like OP is complaining about her being too weak tbh, which considering she was handled by the same bloke who gutted Akali while saying with a straight face it wasn't a nerf, would be understandable.

Does anyone else really hate that guy?
Does 90% of Akali mains count? Rick "Not A Nerf!" Maher is pretty much a meme by now.
